text: @realDonaldTrump White House and tRump were alerted, on April 6th, that antibody tests for Covid-19 antibodies are not reliable. YET THE PUBLIC WAS NOT TOLD! Yet manufactures of defective kits have been permitted to market kits. tRump's buddies profiteering again!
